name: Beat Repeat
description:
This game is a single player, 2D rhythm based game.

It involves the player pressing the right key on the keyboard at the right time in a “Simon says” crossed with Guitar Hero type manner.
A sequence of rhythmic button presses are played to the player and they must repeat these button presses in the correct order and rhythm to pass the level.
The game features music which accompanies these rhythms to give the player context for the rhythms.
This music gradually speeds up over the course of the level to increase the difficulty.
